bio: Fantasy romance writer with a passion for complex magic systems and impossible love stories. Believer in happily ever afters, even when they require saving the world first.
Sci-fi romance author exploring the intersection of love and technology. PhD in theoretical physics turned storyteller. Currently working on a series about love across dimensions.
Teen mystery and supernatural fiction writer. Former boarding school student with way too many secrets to spill. Loves creating atmospheric stories that keep readers guessing.
Writer of heartfelt romances set in small coastal towns. Loves stories about second chances, found family, and the healing power of community. Always writing with a cup of tea in hand.
Gothic horror and paranormal romance author with a fascination for Victorian England and the creatures that lurk in its shadows. Coffee addict and vintage book collector.
Thriller and action writer specializing in strong female protagonists and high-stakes espionage. Former military, now channeling those experiences into page-turning fiction.
Epic fantasy author with a love for dragons, magic systems, and coming-of-age stories. Worldbuilding enthusiast who probably spends too much time drawing maps of fictional realms.
Cyberpunk and futuristic romance writer exploring what it means to be human in an increasingly digital world. Coder by day, storyteller by night.
Mystery and horror writer with a specialty in small-town gothic stories. Journalist by training, which means I know exactly how to dig up the secrets that people want to keep buried.
